title: President tells 59th SLFP Anniversary: Changes strengthen democracy
content: Daily News – By Rasika SOMARATHNA President Mahinda Rajapaksa told the 59th anniversary meeting of the SLFP yesterday that accelerated development, a stable Government, strengthening democracy, peace and prosperity in line with people’s expectations were the aims of the envisaged constitutional amendments and not the extension of his term in office. Addressing over 15,000, including…
